member.name: IShellLibrary.AddFolder
member.summary: Adds a folder to the library.
member.param: An object that represents the folder to be added to the library.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IShellLibrary.Commit
member.summary: Commits library updates to an existing Library Description file.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IShellLibrary.GetDefaultSaveFolder
member.summary: Retrieves the default target folder that the library uses for save operations.
member.param: The value that specifies the save folder to get.

A reference to the IID of the interface to get in ppv that will represent the save location. This value is typically IID_IShellItem, but it can also be IID_IShellItem2 or the IID of any other interface that is implemented by CShellItem.
A pointer to the interface requested in riid.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IShellLibrary.GetFolders
member.summary: Gets the set of child folders that are contained in the library.

param.name: lff
param.para: One of the following values that determines the folders to get. These flags cannot be combined.
Get only file-system folders. File-system folders are folders that have the attribute set.
Get all folders that can be bound to objects. These folders are folders that have the or attribute set.
Get all folders in the library.

member.param: A reference to the IID of the interface to get in ppv. This value is typically IID_IShellItemArray, but it can also be IID_IObjectCollection, IID_IObjectArray, or the IID of any other interface that is implemented by CShellItemArray.
A pointer to the interface requested in riid. If this call fails, this value is NULL.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

listheader.description: The call was successful and the specified folders were returned in ppv.
The call was successful but not all specified folders were returned in ppv.
This method can return other error values.

member.name: IShellLibrary.GetFolderType
member.param: The view template that is applied to a folder, usually based on its intended use and contents.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IShellLibrary.GetIcon
member.summary: Gets the default icon for the library.

param.name: ppszIcon
param.para: A null-terminated Unicode string that describes the location of the default icon. The string is returned as ModuleFileName,ResourceIndex or ModuleFileName,-ResourceID.

listheader.description: The file name of the module file that contains the icon resource.
If the number that follows the comma is positive, the index of the resource in the module file.
If the number that follows the comma is negative, the absolute value of the number is the resource ID of the icon in the module file.

member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IShellLibrary.GetOptions
member.param: The library options for this library. is a bitwise enumerator, which means that more than one flag could be set.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IShellLibrary.LoadLibraryFromItem
member.summary: Loads the library from a specified library definition file.
member.param: An object for the library definition file to load. An error is returned if this object is not a library.
One or more STGM storage medium flags that specify access and sharing modes for the library object.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IShellLibrary.LoadLibraryFromKnownFolder
member.summary: Loads the library that is referenced by a KNOWNFOLDERID.
member.param: The KNOWNFOLDERID value that identifies the library to load.
One or more STGM storage medium flags that specify access and sharing modes for the library object.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IShellLibrary.RemoveFolder
member.summary: Removes a folder from the library.
member.param: An object that represents the folder to remove.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IShellLibrary.ResolveFolder
member.summary: Resolves the target location of a library folder, even if the folder has been moved or renamed.
member.param: An object that represents the library folder to locate.
The maximum time, in milliseconds, the method will attempt to locate the folder before returning. If the folder could not be located before the specified time elapses, an error is returned.

A reference to the IID of the interface to get in ppv that will represent the resolved target location. This value is typically IID_IShellItem, but it can also be IID_IShellItem2 or the IID of any other interface that is implemented by CShellItem.
A pointer to the interface requested in riid.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

listheader.description: The target folder was located and returned in ppv; however, the library has been updated so or should be called to persist these changes.
The target folder was located and returned in ppv.
This method can return other error values.

member.name: IShellLibrary.Save
member.summary: Saves the library to a new Library Description (*.library-ms) file.
member.param: The object that specifies the folder in which to save the library, or NULL to save the library with the user's default libraries in the FOLDERID_Libraries known folder.
The file name under which to save the library. The file name must not include the file name extension; the file name extension is added automatically.
The value that specifies how to handle a library name collision.
The object that represents the library description file into which the library was saved.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IShellLibrary.SaveInKnownFolder
member.summary: Saves the library to a new file in a specified known folder.

param.name: kfidToSaveIn
param.para: The ID of the known folder in which to save the object.

member.param: The file name under which to save the library. The file name must not include the file name extension; the file name extension is added automatically.
The value that specifies how to handle a library name collision.
The object that represents the library description file into which the library was saved.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IShellLibrary.SetDefaultSaveFolder
member.summary: Sets the default target folder that the library will use for save operations.
member.param: The value that specifies the default save location to set.
An object that represents the folder that to use as the default save location. The folder that this object represents must be a folder that is already in the library.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IShellLibrary.SetFolderType
member.param: The GUID or FOLDERTYPEID that represents the view template that is applied to a folder, usually based on its intended use and contents.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IShellLibrary.SetIcon
member.summary: Sets the default icon for the library.

param.name: pszIcon
param.para: A null-terminated Unicode string that describes the location of the default icon. The string must be formatted as ModuleFileName,ResourceIndex or ModuleFileName,-ResourceID.

listheader.description: The file name of the module file that contains the icon resource.
A positive decimal number that specifies the index of the icon resource in the module file.
A negative decimal number whose absolute value is the resource ID of the icon resource in the module file.

member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IShellLibrary.SetOptions
member.param: A bitmask that specifies the values to change in this call.
A bitmask that specifies the new value of each value to change. LIBRARYOPTIONFLAGS values that are not set in lofMask are not changed by this call.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IShellLibrary
member.summary: Exposes methods for creating and managing libraries.
